title: contains classical articles by most of the philosophers mentioned in the foregoing chapter, together with an introduction which gives a brief history of modern philosophy of mind from William James to the present. Good recent introductory textbooks in philosophy of mind are Paul Churchland, Matter and Consciousness: A Contemporary Introduction to the Philosophy of Mind
